room_title: Escape room "Dracula’s Castle" by Escape Room Lititz in Lancaster
room_description: Count Dracula’s reign of terror must come to an end! Professor Van Helsing made this his mission. Gathering all his wits and strength he entered Dracula’s Castle to face the evil Count. He never returned, becoming the next victim of the vampire. The task now falls on you and your group. Bringing only your lantern, your group must explore the dark castle, solve its mysteries, and destroy the vampire. Your time is limited. Night falls in one hour, and the vampire will wake… And he is not too fond of visitors in his castle trying to kill him.
